SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.cal_id , a.cal_amount , a.cal_status , a.post_id , a.cal_date , a.writer_id , a.bank_code , a.account_number FROM(SELECT c.cal_id , c.cal_amount , code_val(c.cal_status) cal_status , c.post_id , c.cal_date , p.writer_id , code_val(m.bank_code) bank_code , account_number FROM calculation c JOIN package_regist p ON c.post_id = p.post_id JOIN member m ON p.writer_id = m.member_id WHERE c.cal_status = 'V1' ORDER BY c.cal_id DESC) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
